title: KIM SWITCH / REJOIN AFTER MEASURHEAD TALK
description: Kim rejoins the party after Harry and Measurehead exit (Measurhead's) Mum's office.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Finally. I thought I have to come..."
dialogueTree.text: "Finally. I thought I have to come looking for you. What took you so long?"

links.title: You: ""We got into some pretty deep water..."
links.text: "We got into some pretty deep waters there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Really? What happened?""
links.text: "Really? What happened?"

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Probably shouldn't have asked you t..."
links.text: Probably shouldn't have asked you this.

links.title: You: ""We became one.""
links.text: "We became one."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Wasn't that back when you became h..."
links.text: "Wasn't that back when you became his 'race pupil'?"

links.title: You: ""That was about race. *This* is abo..."
links.text: "That was about race. *This* is about sex. I admire him."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, of course. Now it makes sense...."
links.text: "Oh, of course. Now it makes sense." He nods, looking down at the lorries.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "That makes absolutely no sense, but..."
links.text: That makes absolutely no sense, but I really don't want to get into it with you.

links.title: You: ""No. That was different.""
links.text: "No. That was different."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, of course. I didn't realize th..."
links.text: "Oh, of course. I didn't realize that." He looks at the lorries down on the street and turns...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's get back to work, detective...."
links.text: "Let's get back to work, detective. I don't like being up here."

links.title: You: ""I don't think I should talk to him..."
links.text: "I don't think I should talk to him any more."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I completely agree. Your current s..."
links.text: "I completely agree. Your current state seems to make you very vulnerable to suggestions. And he's got a lot of them." He smiles.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I hope he means it and at least som..."
links.text: I hope he means it and at least some kind of an early defence system in his psyche is working.

links.title: You: ""Can't you for just once roll with..."
links.text: "Can't you for just once roll with it, lieutenant?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hate to repeat myself, but was t..."
links.text: "I hate to repeat myself, but was that not what happened back when you became his race pupil?" He flashes you a disarming smile.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope you don't take offence if I..."
links.text: "I hope you don't take offence if I don't pressure you for details. We really need to get back to work." He smiles.

links.title: You: ""I was like a blind horse when he *..."
links.text: "I was like a blind horse when he *led* me to water and made me drink."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good good, that's very good." The..."
links.text: "Good good, that's very good." The smile persists as he turns to leave. "I almost feel bad that we need to focus on our investigation now. But we do. Let's go."

links.title: Drama: "His remorse is insincere. That gent..."
links.text: His remorse is insincere. That gent's relieved to beest able to moveth on my liege.

links.title: You: ""That's alright, Kim. Let's move."..."
links.text: "That's alright, Kim. Let's move." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""It was *unbelievably* manly.""
links.text: "It was *unbelievably* manly."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right..." He nods, covering his mo..."
links.text: "Right..." He nods, covering his mouth with the back of the hand. "Did he teach you a way to turn back time?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Trying to hide a smile."
links.text: Trying to hide a smile.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Was it a mistake leaving him alone..."
links.text: Was it a mistake leaving him alone with that guy?

links.title: You: ""No, but I learned that no matter h..."
links.text: "No, but I learned that no matter how though you are, someone's always tougher."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Him?" The lieutenant's eyes meet y..."
links.text: "Him?" The lieutenant's eyes meet yours. He's listening.

links.title: You: ""His father. I think he had it roug..."
links.text: "His father. I think he had it rough."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Rough like Cuno?""
links.text: "Rough like Cuno?"

links.title: You: ""No. Different, but still rough.""
links.text: "No. Different, but still rough."

links.title: You: ""Not *that* rough.""
links.text: "Not *that* rough."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes," the lieutenant agrees, "I go..."
links.text: "Yes," the lieutenant agrees, "I got that vibe from him too. Explains a lot." His eyes turn to the gate, then back to you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everyone had it rough around here...."
links.text: "Everyone had it rough around here. It's a rough time in a rough place. I'm not trying to belittle him, but find me Revacholian who didn't have it rough. They don't exist."

links.title: Rhetoric: "Except perhaps people in Ozonne."
links.text: Except perhaps people in Ozonne.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go now," says the lieutenant..."
links.text: "Let's go now," says the lieutenant and turns to move. "It's getting cold and it's too late to put him in a foster home."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "I knocked *him* out, but hi..."
links.text: (Nod.) "I knocked *him* out, but his father could probably kill me."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But he's not going to, because thi..."
links.text: "But he's not going to, because this is not a school yard and we are not children." He looks up at the sky...

links.title: You: "Just nod."
links.text: Just nod.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't break eye co..."
links.text: The lieutenant doesn't break eye contact. He slowly nods too, then pats you on the arm...

links.title: You: ""No, he didn't even want to share h..."
links.text: "No, he didn't even want to share his novel techniques with me..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably best for everyone...."
links.text: "That's probably best for everyone." A smirk flashes over his face as his turns to move. "My condolences of course, but solving this case will make you feel better. about it. I promise."

links.title: You: ""Not exactly, but I'm going to star..."
links.text: "Not exactly, but I'm going to start building up strategic semen reserves."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But... why?" He looks completely p..."
links.text: "But... why?" He looks completely perplexed for a moment, but quickly gathers himself. "Actually, do me a favour and please don't tell me. Let's just quickly go and that'll be it."

links.title: You: ""No, he thought it's a bad idea and..."
links.text: "No, he thought it's a bad idea and that I should stop obsessing about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh..." The lieutenant thoughtfull..."
links.text: "Huh..." The lieutenant thoughtfully rubs his chin as he turns to move "So there is something we agree on after all. Didn't see that coming. But let's move, I don't like being up here."

links.title: You: ""No, but he did seem to believe it..."
links.text: "No, but he did seem to believe it is possible."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Based on other things he *believes..."
links.text: "Based on other things he *believes* I wouldn't put much weight on it." He turns to move. "Let's get back to work."

links.title: You: ""It got very personal and a bit wei..."
links.text: "It got very personal and a bit weird."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Shocking..." He nods, covering his..."
links.text: "Shocking..." He nods, covering his mouth with the back of the hand. "Did you learn how to turn back time?"

links.title: You: ""Time flies when you're in a good c..."
links.text: "Time flies when you're in a good company -- how long was I in there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Couple of months, a year maybe?" h..."
links.text: "Couple of months, a year maybe?" he replies, glancing at his wrist-watch. "What happened in there?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "His serious, business-like tone doe..."
links.text: His serious, business-like tone doesn't waiver for a second.

links.title: You: ""Just men being men, Kim. You would..."
links.text: "Just men being men, Kim. You wouldn't understand." (Look solemnly to the horizon.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""René!" he says, snapping his finge..."
links.text: "René!" he says, snapping his fingers.

links.title: Composure: "As if a revelation just hit him."
links.text: As if a revelation just hit him.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're not going to like it."
links.text: You're not going to like it.

links.title: You: ""What about René?""
links.text: "What about René?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are really starting to remind..."
links.text: "You are really starting to remind me of him. It's not a compliment. I don't like it."

links.title: You: ""You think he's our *killer* after..."
links.text: "You think he's our *killer* after all?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I don't. But you are reminding..."
links.text: "No, I don't. But you are reminding me of him more and more. It's not a compliment, I don't like it."

links.title: You: "Just ignore him."
links.text: Just ignore him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right..." He nods. "Did he teach y..."
links.text: "Right..." He nods. "Did he teach you to turn back time?"

links.title: Rhetoric: "The sarcasm is so finely tuned it a..."
links.text: The sarcasm is so finely tuned it actually comes off like worry.

links.title: You: ""No, he didn't even want to share h..."
links.text: "No, he didn't even want to share his novel techniques..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably best for everyone...."
links.text: "That's probably best for everyone." A smirk flashes over his face as he turns to move. "My condolences of course, but solving this case will make you feel better. I promise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, let's go. It's getting co..."
links.text: "Alright, let's go. It's getting cold."

links.title: You: ""No, he thought it's a bad idea and..."
links.text: "No, he thought it's a bad idea and that I should stop obsessing about it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Huh..." The lieutenant thoughtfull..."
links.text: "Huh..." The lieutenant thoughtfully rubs his chin as he turns to move. "So there is something we agree on after all. Didn't see it coming. But let's move, I'm getting cold."

links.title: You: ""No, but he did seem to believe it'..."
links.text: "No, but he did seem to believe it's possible."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Based on other things he *believes..."
links.text: "Based on other things he *believes* I wouldn't put much weight on it." He turns to move. "Now let's get back to work."

links.title: You: ""What happens in Measurehead's moth..."
links.text: "What happens in Measurehead's mother's office stays in Measurehead's mother's office."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's probably best for everyone...."
links.text: "That's probably best for everyone." He nods. "Let's go then."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I don't need a word-for-word retell..."
links.text: I don't need a word-for-word retelling, but we're partners -- say *something*. An adjective will do.
